attributes.action: Bring back the death penalty for murder. A life for a life.
attributes.additional_details: The death penalty needs to be brought back. One, it would save people having to suffer the trauma of the prisoner being released. Two, it would save the country money. (£40,000 a year per prisoner). We need justice, we don't want to go down the route of other countries where the prisoners sit on death row for twenty years, with a roof over there head and three meals a day. It needs to be instant, sentence undertaken when convicted. Mistakes shouldn't happen, especially when we have numerous ways to prove the individuals committed the crimes.
